wikitext.*:
'''Ecthelion''' may refer to:

* '''[[Ecthelion]] (d. {{FA|510}}), an [[Noldor|Elf]] of [[Gondolin]], Lord of the [[House of the Fountain]], and slayer of the [[Balrogs|Balrog]] [[Gothmog (balrog)|Gothmog]].'''
* [[Ecthelion I]] ({{TA|2600}} – {{TA|2698|n}}), the seventeenth [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]].
** The [[Tower of Ecthelion]], the highest tower of [[Gondor]]'s capital city, [[Minas Tirith]], which was rebuilt by [[Ecthelion I]].
* [[Ecthelion II]] ({{TA|2886}} – {{TA|2984|n}}), the twenty-fifth [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]] and paternal grandfather of [[Boromir]] and [[Faramir]].
